statements: SELECT * FROM CameraData ORDER BY captured_datetime DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id, captured_datetime FROM CameraData WHERE captured_datetime >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, image_data FROM CameraData WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM CameraData WHERE captured_datetime >= '2020-01-01' AND captured_datetime <= '2021-01-01'
SELECT id, captured_datetime, image_data FROM CameraData ORDER BY captured_datetime ASC
SELECT * FROM CameraData ORDER BY captured_datetime DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id,image_data FROM CameraData WHERE captured_datetime >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY captured_datetime;
SELECT id, captured_datetime FROM CameraData WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM captured_datetime) = 2;
SELECT id FROM CameraData WHERE captured_datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM CameraData WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_name FROM images WHERE image_id = 2;
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM images WHERE image_id > 3;
SELECT image_name, image_data FROM images WHERE image_id = 4;
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_data FROM images WHERE image_id <= 5;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_name FROM images ORDER BY image_name DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM images WHERE image_name LIKE '%cat%';
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM images JOIN videos ON images.image_id = videos.video_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS image_count FROM images;
SELECT * FROM image_data;
SELECT id, image_url FROM image_data WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT capture_timestamp, image_url FROM image_data ORDER BY capture_timestamp DESC;
SELECT camera_id, COUNT(*) AS total_images FROM image_data GROUP BY camera_id;
SELECT * FROM camera_info WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM image_data WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY capture_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, image_url FROM image_data WHERE camera_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM video_data WHERE capture_timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, camera_id FROM image_data WHERE capture_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-28';
SELECT camera_name, location FROM camera_info WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_id, image_url, capture_timestamp FROM images ORDER BY capture_timestamp DESC;
SELECT camera_id, camera_name, location FROM cameras WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT image_url, camera_name FROM images INNER JOIN cameras ON images.camera_id = cameras.camera_id;
SELECT * FROM inspections WHERE inspection_result = 'passed';
SELECT * FROM images WHERE camera_id = 1 ORDER BY capture_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT camera_name, location FROM cameras WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY camera_name ASC;
SELECT image_url, capture_timestamp FROM images WHERE image_id IN (SELECT image_id FROM inspections WHERE inspection_result = 'pass');
SELECT * FROM videos JOIN cameras ON videos.camera_id = cameras.camera_id WHERE cameras.location = 'Office';
SELECT image_id, image_url, capture_timestamp FROM images WHERE capture_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM robots;
SELECT robot_name, robot_type FROM robots WHERE robot_type = 'Humanoid';
SELECT image_url, capture_date FROM images ORDER BY capture_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' AND analysis_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT video_url, capture_date FROM videos WHERE robot_id IN (SELECT robot_id FROM robots WHERE robot_type = 'Drone');
SELECT image_id, image_url, capture_date FROM images WHERE capture_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT robot_name, robot_type FROM robots ORDER BY robot_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_videos FROM videos;
SELECT analysis_id, result FROM analysis WHERE analysis_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
